# galaxy_sql_job (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `sql_job_id` (String) SQL query scheduled job

### Read-Only

- `cluster_id` (String) ID of cluster in which SQL job gets executed
- `cron_expression` (String) Cron expression which determines SQL job execution interval
- `description` (String) SQL job description
- `name` (String) SQL job name
- `next_execution` (String) Timestamp of SQL job next execution (read only)
- `query` (String) SQL query to execute
- `role_id` (String) Role used when SQL job is executed
- `timezone` (String) Timezone in which CRON is evaluated. Defaults to UTC
